placeholder.teaser-banner: A new way to use web is coming
placeholder.teaser-web-on-chain: We are crafting a new era for our web on-chain feature...

deweb.title: Welcome to the DeWeb
deweb.subtitle: Your gateway to a fully decentralized web
deweb.description: The DeWeb is your gateway to a fully decentralized web. Our vision is to create an on-chain web ecosystem with no intermediaries, addressing security and reliability concerns associated with centralized servers.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: The DeWeb aims to revolutionize the internet by enabling a fully decentralized web experience. By storing all websites on-chain, we eliminate the risks associated with centralized servers, such as single points of failure and vulnerability to hacks. This approach enhances security, ensuring that websites are resilient against censorship and attacks, and provides true freedom and accessibility to everyone.

components.title: DeWeb Ecosystem
components.description: Explore the different parts of the DeWeb ecosystem to understand how they work together to create a decentralized web experience.

mns.title: Massa Name System (MNS)
mns.description: Register and manage .massa domain names on the decentralized DNS. MNS allows you to create unique, recognizable web addresses that are on-chain, fully replicated, and immutable NFTs.

features.feature1: Ownership for Life - No rent or renewal fees
features.feature2: Refundable Domain Release - Get 50% back when freeing domains
features.feature3: Tradable NFTs - Trade domains on platforms like Purrfect Universe

explorer.title: DeWeb Explorer
explorer.description: Search and discover decentralized websites hosted on the Massa blockchain. Find projects, applications, and content in the on-chain web ecosystem.

uploader.title: DeWeb Uploader
uploader.description: Upload your websites and decentralized applications directly to the Massa blockchain. Host both front-end and back-end components on-chain using familiar web technologies.

documentation.title: DeWeb Documentation
documentation.description: Learn how to build, deploy, and manage your decentralized web presence. Comprehensive guides for developers and users to get started with the DeWeb ecosystem.

item0.title: Security & Reliability
item0.description: Eliminate single points of failure and vulnerability to hacks associated with centralized servers.

item1.title: Censorship Resistance
item1.description: Websites are resilient against censorship and attacks, providing true freedom and accessibility.

item2.title: No Intermediaries
item2.description: Direct interaction with the blockchain without third-party hosting services or centralized authorities.

item3.title: Cost Effective
item3.description: One-time storage fees based on file size, no monthly hosting or bandwidth charges.

get-started.title: Get Started with DeWeb
get-started.description: Ready to explore the decentralized web? Choose your path below:

users.title: For Users
users.description: Access decentralized websites and explore the on-chain web ecosystem.

options.option0: Run a local DeWeb server for complete privacy
options.option1: Use DeWeb providers for universal access

developers.title: For Developers
developers.description: Build and deploy your projects directly on the Massa blockchain.

dashboard.bridge-desc: Bridge ERC-20 tokens from EVM chains to Massa and vice versa!
dashboard.explorer-desc: Search through real-time and historical records on Massa blockchain.
dashboard.foundation-desc: Learn about Massa ecosystem and initiatives.
dashboard.massalabs-desc: Unique Lab supporting Massa ecosystem and creating innovative solutions.
dashboard.purrfect-desc: Create, buy & sell NFTs on the Massa blockchain.
dashboard.dusa-desc: Advanced, customizable and fully decentralized trading protocol.

massa-wallet.title: Massa Wallet
